item.title: Automating Merchant Live Monitoring with Real-Time Analytics - Charon
item.guid: Automating Merchant Live Monitoring with Real-Time Analytics - Charon
item.description: Focus on Uber’s real-time data platform components to build a tool called Charon to reduce impact of poor marketplace reliability on the merchants.

item.title: Bridging batch and stream processing for the Recruiter usage statistics dashboard
item.guid: Bridging batch and stream processing for the Recruiter usage statistics dashboard
item.description: Focus on using large set intersection cardinality approximations with Apache Pinot and Theta Sketches, which allow us to efficiently figure out the unique size of a targeted audience when factoring in multiple criteria of an advertising campaign.

item.title: Auto-tuning Pinot real-time consumption
item.description: Focus on using large set intersection cardinality approximations with Apache Pinot and Theta Sketches, which allow us to efficiently figure out the unique size of a targeted audience when factoring in multiple criteria of an advertising campaign.

item.title: Introducing ThirdEye - LinkedIn’s Business-Wide Monitoring Platform
item.guid: Introducing ThirdEye - LinkedIn’s Business-Wide Monitoring Platform
item.description: ThirdEye is a comprehensive platform for real-time monitoring of metrics that covers a wide variety of use-cases.

item.title: From Lambda to Lambda-less Lessons learned
item.guid: From Lambda to Lambda-less Lessons learned
item.description: The Lambda architecture has become a popular architectural style that promises both speed and accuracy in data processing by using a hybrid approach of both batch processing and stream processing methods.

item.title: Monitoring business performance data with ThirdEye smart alerts
item.guid: Monitoring business performance data with ThirdEye smart alerts
item.description: Focus on using large set intersection cardinality approximations with Apache Pinot and Theta Sketches, which allow us to efficiently figure out the unique size of a targeted audience when factoring in multiple criteria of an advertising campaign.

item.title: Star-tree index - Powering fast aggregations on Pinot
item.guid: Star-tree index - Powering fast aggregations on Pinot
item.description: Introduced Star-Tree index to utilize the pre-aggregated documents in a smart way that achieves low query latencies, while using the storage space efficiently.

item.title: Building LinkedIn Talent Insights to democratize data-driven decision making
item.guid: Building LinkedIn Talent Insights to democratize data-driven decision making
item.description: Focus on using large set intersection cardinality approximations with Apache Pinot and Theta Sketches, which allow us to efficiently figure out the unique size of a targeted audience when factoring in multiple criteria of an advertising campaign.

item.title: Solving for the cardinality of set intersection at scale with Pinot and Theta Sketches
item.guid: Solving for the cardinality of set intersection at scale with Pinot and Theta Sketches
item.description: Focus on using large set intersection cardinality approximations with Apache Pinot and Theta Sketches, which allow us to efficiently figure out the unique size of a targeted audience when factoring in multiple criteria of an advertising campaign.

item.title: Analyzing anomalies with ThirdEye
item.description: Focus on using large set intersection cardinality approximations with Apache Pinot and Theta Sketches, which allow us to efficiently figure out the unique size of a targeted audience when factoring in multiple criteria of an advertising campaign.

item.title: Operating Apache Pinot at Uber Scale
item.guid: Operating Apache Pinot at Uber Scale
item.description: Present details of this platform and how it fits in Uber’s ecosystem. Explain how uber scaled from a few use cases to a multi-cluster powering hundreds of use cases for querying terabyte-scale data with millisecond latencies.

item.title: Engineering SQL Support on Apache Pinot at Uber
item.guid: Engineering SQL Support on Apache Pinot at Uber
item.description: Talks about solution that linked Presto, a query engine that supports full ANSI SQL, and Pinot, a real-time OLAP (online analytical processing) datastore.

item.title: Engineering Restaurant Manager - UberEATS Analytics Dashboard
item.guid: Engineering Restaurant Manager - UberEATS Analytics Dashboard
item.description: Restaurant Manager is a comprehensive analytics dashboard and pipeline for our restaurant partners. In this article, we discuss how we architected this analytics platform and its robust data pipeline.

item.title: Open Sourcing Pinot - Scaling the Wall of Real-Time Analytics
item.guid: Open Sourcing Pinot - Scaling the Wall of Real-Time Analytics
item.description: Introducing Pinot which allow to slice and dice across billions of rows in real-time across a wide variety of products
